casebody.data:
Wednesday, February 9, 1994

MERIT DOCKET

93-2319. Lentz v. Ohio Dept. of Rehab. & Corr.

In Mandamus. On answer of respondent. Answer treated as motion to dismiss. Motion to dismiss sustained. Cause dismissed.

Moyer, C.J., A.W. Sweeney, Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney and Pfeifer, JJ., concur. Wright, J., dissents.
